entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Estevan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -20.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Estevan Airport 3:58 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -20.8°C
Pressure: 103.8 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -24.9°C
Wind: N 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
